short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps to import product reviews from AliExpress, Amazon, Etsy, DHgate and Walmart.com to Ryviu Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
- Import photo reviews to enhance visual appeal and credibility.
- Filter and import AliExpress reviews by specific countries.
- Import Amazon reviews using either the productâ€™s ASIN or parent ASIN for comprehensive feedback.
- Collect reviews from multiple products to build strong social proof.

- And much more!

Compatibility:
- Shopify Product Reviews: https://apps.shopify.com/ryviu
- WordPress WooCommerce Product Reviews: https://www.ryviu.com

Enhance your store's credibility and boost sales with Ryviu. Easy to use and designed to increase your conversion rates.
